I would recommend this game due to the amount of fun you can have with the right people. ive made alot of friends from this game and many ive lost. i have had good and bad times but it is still a fun game just know your place and have fun :)
I do recommend this game it is great and very fun. It is a highly competitive fps shooter game that I would recommend to anyone who likes that kinda stuff.

Fun game! Highly recommend giving it a try

Хорошая игра. 
Плюсы:
Можно поиграть. 
Можно пострелять.
Можно побегать.
Минусы:
Можно встретить читеров.
Можно встретить Поляков.
Можно встретить Русских.
В итоге игра хорошая, да. Так она мне понравилась!
Моя личная оценка как самого авторитетного обзорщика игр как в СНГ, так и в Мире: 12/10 Казяка гений.

The OG tactical shooter, gunplay can be counter-intuitive, but easy to learn if you care enough.  Great game. Whether you find the gunplay counter-intuitive depends on what shooters you're familiar with beforehand. I tried this game for the first time as a COD player and now I hate COD and love CS:GO. But in the beginning it was surely the other way around.
Este juego esta bien, pero odio a los hackers

Wenn man mal spielt, auch nur gelegentlich, dann ist Counter Strike DAS Spiel schlechthin. Leider lange her, dass ich richtig dabei war, mein PC ist zu langsam, kein Skill mehr. Aber der Spaß ist unverändert, auch wenn ich es 15 Jahre lang nicht mehr gespielt habe.

This game is amazing. I've never had much of an issue with the community after 650 hours. There are enough game modes to learn at a reasonable rate and feel like you're improving. It's one of the greatest competitive shooters ever made!

The best team-oriented shooter on the market. Now free-to-play, the objectives are easy to understand but hard to master. If you practice Counter-Strike, the mechanics will make you better at other shooter games. There is a reason the majority of big Twitch streamers started off as competitive Counter-Strike players (Shroud, Summit1G, etc)
it live's up to the older counter strikes such as counter strike source.
